While making money from thirsty customers is nice, the prize Franz truly seeks is a red haired beauty he's been hopelessly in love with since his early teens. Can you help win the heart of Maggie?

name: Everslash
description: Everslash is an action platformer game where you have to quickly move and attack with your scythe. Use your Slash Attack moves to dodge and hit your foes at the same time; defeat the monsters infesting the lab and find your way out.

name: Marvel's Iron Man VR
description: In Marvel's Iron Man VR the player, who plays as the genius inventor Tony Stark, confronts ghosts from his past—powerful forces who seek to ruin him and everything he stands for. By fully embracing the magic of PlayStation VR, players will come face-to-face with iconic allies and Super Villains as they jet around the globe on a heroic mission to save not only Stark Industries, but the world itself.

name: Loopover
description: Sin descripción

name: It Doesn't Have to Be Like This
description: You play a gas station clerk working her shift on the day the earth is destroyed.

name: Dead But Dreaming
description: Dead But Dreaming is your descent into madness, disguised as a 12-level limit-removing episode for Doom 2 summoned by @dmdr and the occult folks of Doomer Boards.

name: Chrono Trigger: Bugfix and Uncensoring Patch
description: This patch is geared towards fixing bugs and patching up script inconsistencies or censorship. The aim is to preserve the original translation while generally improving the game as a whole.

name: Oppai Odyssey
description: Oppai Odyssey is an adult visual novel and dating sim, focusing on the crew of USF starship Agni as they traverse the galaxy in search of a new planet for humanity to colonize. Enjoy a fully explorable starship, filled with events to enjoy with your crewmates.

name: Super Mado Paf!!
description:
Super Mado Paf!! is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.

It is a shooter game where the player must defeat the enemies moving around the screen. The goal is to get as high a score as possible. You play as Madotsuki and fight against enemies.

name: Planet Ennea
description: Planet Ennea is a short game made for the fourth Dream Diary Jam using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine. It focuses around a newly built robot and their desire to understand the lives and emotions of those around them. It features way more text than your standard Yume Nikki fangame, but that's fine, isn't it? You won't talk much, but you'll have the chance to listen.

name: None
description: Play as None as they explore their dreams. This is a game made for Dream Diary Jam 4. The concept and mechanics are based on the 2004 indie game Yume Nikki.

name: Lock In: Final Cut
description: It doesn't matter why you're here.

name: V.D.O
description:
V.D.O is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.
You explore the dreams of Grey and each dream is split into linear sections that the player must complete to progress.

name: Don't Be Afraid: The First Toy
description: Don't Be Afraid - The First Toy, is an introduction to the dramatic story of a boy kidnapped by a psychopath. Exploring the giant house of your torturer you will soon discover things worse than your childish nightmares. Take on the role of Jamie and see what phrase “The First Toy” actually means.

name: Krim: The War in the Crimea 1941-42
description: KRIM: The War in the Crimea 1941-42 is an operational/strategic simulation of the German 11th Army’s operations in the Crimean Peninsula from late October 1941 through 4 July 1942.

name: Strip Black Jack: Hot Gym
description: Caroline and Nora are super hot coaches and invite you to a sexy card game. Play against Nora in Easy or Normal mode and beat her to make Coraline drop her clothes and show you her sweaty naked body.

name: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital
description:
These adorable pets aren’t feeling too well, so let’s give them the care they need! Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital is a simulation game in which you can have the dream job you’ve always wanted taking care of cute, fluffy friends.

Various breeds of puppies and kittens will need your expertise at the clinic. In Checkup Mode carefully check for illnesses or injuries by performing various diagnostic tests: taking X-rays, checking temperatures, and monitoring vital signs. Once you diagnose the ailments, administer the treatments as part of your dream job.

On your days off, wind down by relaxing at the cafe! Go shopping and enjoy 184 different outfits you can wear. Visit the hair salon and choose from 40 different hairstyles! Enjoy your free time hanging out in the city going to the movies, the amusement park, the beach, and much more!

name: Story
description: Story is one-evening adventure RPG with a great emphasize on player-driven narrative.

name: Vectromirror 0
description: Become the Test Subject and attempt to complete a challenging experiment to awaken emotional responses in your Artificial Intelligence. Jump, wall-run, and parkour your way through the free-to-play prequel to the upcoming game.

name: World Puzzle
description: World Puzzle - a classic puzzle with several levels of difficulty, more than a dozen different author's drawings in the style of pixel art, limited time and limit of lives, all for the perfect game in a relaxing manner.

name: Fury Captain
description: Fury Captain - Top Down Shooter game filled with action, from chases to protect the city, drive a car and shoot bandits on motorcycles, take a machine gun and try to fight off a wave of bandits who are trying to break through the gates of the city.

name: Paper Dolls 2
description: Paper Dolls 2 is a first-person horror adventure game. A dark aura emanates from a Qing dynasty dwelling—the Yin Mansion. What happened to the once-famous Yin Family? Clues lead us to its second floor haunted by restless spirits. A truth, buried for over a hundred years, is waiting to be unraveled.

developers.name: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

name: Juicy Memory Card
description: Simple and at the same time incredibly difficult game with finding pairs! It sounds easy, but you will plunge into a world where memory, concentration, attention and speed of thinking rule. Develop your memory and reaction, discover new levels and beautiful art that rewards your efforts.

name: From the Grave
description: From The Grave is a zombie Survival game where you are placed in a medieval dungeon to fight endless hordes of zombies. This game includes a fully voiced main protagonist, a fully made custom map to explore, and a set of 6 different unique weapons to fight the undead. This creepy atmosphere adventure will feel like a throwback to old zombie games where it's just you, a pistol, and a horde of zombies trying to kill you.

name: Toricky S
description: Toricky-S is the switch version of the old-school Action-Adventure game featuring unique mechanics based on fast-flying and physics.

name: Sporadic Spire
description: Defeat hordes of enemies in this aesthetic tower defense game. The random terrain generation provides a beautiful environment and a unique experience every time you play.

name: Truck Crash
description: Truck Crash - an arcade racig game with a view from above, racing on a huge truck, you dodge oncoming cars, holes, washed up sharks, rolling stones from the mountain. Collect gasoline to rush to your destination!

name: Couch Co-Op Bundle Vol. 2
description: It’s time to get cosy with your best bud again for another round of unmissable co-op action. This bundle contains the following games, all of which feature local/couch co-op (as well as single-player modes): Black Paradox, Soul Eater, Bleed and Vertical Drop Heroes.

name: Switchy Road DeluX
description: The widely popular Switchy Road endless roller now comes in a new enhanced deluxe version. The challenging road crossing game now has amazing new levels each with different themes, backgrounds, designs and music! Play starts with the original Switchy Road theme but with skill you will quickly progress through each level to unlock the next unique theme. Once you unlock them all you can go back and select whichever level you want to play again. Play all the levels or stick with your favorite ones. Random generated crossing roads make the challenge different every time you play.

name: Clay Game
description: Explore a world handcrafted from clay. Make dumb jokes with your Foxcat friend. Use magic to solve puzzles. Can you solve the mystery at the Wizard Tower?

name: Shooty Skies Overdrive
description: Escape the arcade in Shooty Skies Overdrive, an action-packed VR shoot ‘em up. Dodge and weave your way through dynamically generated enemy waves and blast them at point-blank range. An incredible journey through colorful retro worlds and ridiculous alien invaders.

name: G-Mode Archives 07: Love Love Knuckle
description: Love Love Knuckle is a goofy beat-em-up starring buff men wearing animal heads. Players use their buff animal man to beat up other buff animal men and collect the high-calorie sweets they drop to recover health. In between battles, players can buy upgrades to customize their character, including new heads.

name: Final Sword
description:
The source of evil, it has brought numerous monster corps.
Defeat the source of evil by acquiring various skills and magics through the adventure.
You will experience breathtaking battles with real fantasy monsters.

name: Arcade Archives: P-47
description: P-47 is a shooting game released by Jaleco in 1988. Use machine guns and special weapons to defeat the enemy troops attacking from the land, sea, and air. With exhilarating great plains, seas of clouds shining in the setting sun, and the open ocean where battleships 4 screens long appear, and more. These immersive stages can be enjoyed with 2 people playing simultaneously.

name: Election Year Knockout
description: Become President in this hilarious Punch-Out-inspired political sim where all laws have been replaced with boxing! Each opponent has unique tactics and special moves to test your skill and strategy on your way to the White House! Form your own third party and hit the campaign trail. Literally.

name: VR Jetpack Game
description: Physics-based VR with full freedom of flight. VR that feels and controls like a real jetpack. A real-time multiplayer VR arena.

name: Cold War Game
description:
Cold War Game - a real-time tactical strategy (RTT) that simulates interaction of various types of troops. Command your troops, show your martial ingenuity and complete all tasks.

According to the developers via their Facebook page, the game is currently hidden in the Steam store due to a DMCA complaint and it will be unavailable to purchase until the problem is settled.

name: Haramatia
description: Haramatia is a terrible and extremely dangerous planet. The once thriving civilization, as usual, destroyed itself, leaving only the gray earth, aggressive animals and distracted biorobots. The main character absolutely does not remember anything, and in the course of the plot will understand who he is and how he turned out to be on this...

name: Dungeon Runner
description: Dungeon Runner is a 2D platformer with a high quality modern-retro design. The game is based on surviving several levels and passing them. Levels are set into chapters. Each chapter provides more difficult levels.

name: Ikemen Prince: Beauty and Her Beast
description:
It's your chance to choose the next king!

You've been selected as "Belle" to choose the next king out of eight princes. If that wasn't hard enough, the princes turn out to be hot... and deadly. They're rumored to be beasts, and you find out that the rumors were far from wrong.

In a world of war and intrigue, will you be able to save his heart and yours as you enter your very own fairy tale?

name: Sonic Mania: Blazey Mix Plus Moveset!
description: Sonic Mania: Blazey Mix Plus Moveset! is a mod for Sonic Mania Plus that replaces Sonic with Blaze the Cat. The mod also adds in a unique play-style for Blaze, which includes a double jump and a fire shield that can be activated for 20 rings.

name: Fallen London: Paisley
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2020.

name: Naruto Arena
description: Naruto Arena Next Generation is an online multiplatform turn-based app strategy game. You pick 3 characters and battle it out against other players.

name: Family Dinner
description: It only takes one night to change everything.

name: Signal
description: A game in the genre of horror that tells you the story of the main character named John who works on the space station Atlant. You will find a leisurely gameplay with elements of small puzzles and story narration through the onboard crew records. Welcome to the space station Atlant!

name: Restricted Area
description: Restricted Area - Play as a soldier in an abandoned world. Survive amongst dangerous zombies. Search for supplies and weapons. Save the world from a dangerous virus.

name: Conflict Area
description: Conflict Area is both a singleplayer and multiplayer game made by 2 developers.

name: Tanklike
description: Tanklike is a cooperative 2D shooter for 1 - 4 players. Improve your stats, upgrade your arsenal, and ricochet your way to victory!

name: Outsider: After Life
description: Outsider: After Life is a nostalgic puzzle adventure that takes you on a galactic journey with HUD-ini, an android who may be the only one who can prevent the end of the universe.

name: Kirakira Stars Idol Project Reika
description: After experiencing joint lessons with DivaFes and Uesugi Produce. Ai and Nobuyuki have taken another step forward as idol producers. What awaits them at the time when they thought their normal life was about to start again is an encounter with new idols. 'I'll take care of you from now on as an idol candidate! Nice to meet you, juniors. It's nice to meet you. A dormant senior idol and a junior idol candidate. Will they bring a new wind to ODA?

name: Progress Game
description: Experience Progress in its purest form as an Idle-Game!

name: Fly Fish
description: This is a casual game that does not contain any violent elements. We will experience its way home from the perspective of a young flying fish. Go home by sprinting, jumping and flying through the dilemma on the road, Improve players' ability to resist setbacks

name: Balloon Pop for Toddlers & Kids: Learn Numbers, Letters, Colors & Animals
description: Popping Balloons has never been so much fun! This game was created for (and with the help of) children of ages two and up. It features fun and relaxing gameplay and was designed to be super-easy to use. It was carefully tested with the help of small children and is guaranteed to be frustration free. The speed and size of the balloons can be customized to fit your child's age and skill level. A variety of funny surprises makes learning even more fun and diverse.

name: Bound
description:
We might forget the words, but every page leaves an impression, plants a seed, or shines a light. Then we are changed from who we were before.

Features a living tree, dead trees, and a nice breeze.

name: Girl With A Lazer Shotgun
description:
This direct-to-vhs retro shooter comes with 10 action packed levels, where you'll have to use every shell from your lazer shotgun carefully.

You've got 8 shells per box, and as you progress through each stage the enemy types become more varied - producing dangerous combinations that will require quick tactics and reflexes.

name: Limiter!
description: Go on a tile-hopping journey with Limiter, an AI programmed to see the world in puzzles. Master bouncing 2 spaces at a time through 7 challenging chapters, restore power to every tile and bring the ARCANE system back online in this addictive and challenging puzzle game by Alex Knowles.

name: Baby Dino Adventures
description: Baby Dino Adventures is a cute platformer game inspired by classic retro games. You play a lost baby T-Rex, and help him find his parents back. You won't kill anyone. But rather solve puzzles, and make new allies throughout this upcoming adventure.

name: Dead Run
description: Travel around a fully-explorable, post-apocalyptic version of Earth and find the source of a mysterious radio signal. Collect supplies along the way to stay alive. Is there anyone out there?

name: Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens
description: Only you can fight back against the snarling overgrowth to free this distant jungle from a mysterious power. The path is perilous – new foes and dangerous puzzles wait in the shade. Find new armor, weapons, and artifacts as you seek to uproot the source of the wicked corruption: the Jungle Abomination.

name: Brain Please Don't
description: Brain Please Don’t is a small game exploring a snapshot of modern teenage life, with an innovative deckbuilding and card-game mechanic studying the inner turmoils, dysfunctionalities and means of improving the situation of one’s psyche. Can you leave young Cameron better off?

name: DanceDanceRevolution A20 Plus
description: DanceDanceRevolution A20 is a music video game, the 16th installment of the Dance Dance Revolution series, and the sequel to DanceDanceRevolution A. The game was released on new, golden cabinets on March 20, 2019 in Japan. A software upgrade for older cabinets for Japan and Asia was released on July 24, 2019, with Korea receiving a localized release on August 1, 2019, and North America on September 24, 2019. A location test in Europe began on October 7, 2019, and ended on March 16, 2020. Dance Dance Revolution A20 Plus is an update that adds 14 new songs, available on July 1, 2020 for Japanese 20th Anniversary cabinets.

name: Crayta
description: Crayta is a collaborative game creation, sharing, and play platform. It brings together people of all ages, experience, ability and background to create multiplayer games.

name: Forking Hell
description: Forking Hell is a single player 3D casual arcade-simulation game where the player guides a forklift vehicle around a virtual warehouse and completes customer orders over the working days. The chaos of the Rumba-Bots combined with the semi-realistic physics helps give an arcade style to the simulation genre. Forking Hell is built with controller or keyboard/mouse input to support various play-styles and preferences.

name: Trackmania
description: Trackmania, the racing franchise from Ubisoft Nadeo, is back with the most compelling remake of Trackmania Nations.

name: V1ruz
description: In V1ruz, you see yourself stuck in the middle of an ever growing virus epidemic in the USA. Learn how to craft weapons, tools and fight against the living and the dead to survive in this cruel, rotting world.

name: The Otterman Empire
description: The Otterman Empire is an intense quick-fire party shooter for one to four players. Working as a team, you must gear up, strap on your jetpack and stop the evil Tiko in his tracks, an otter who just doesn't give a dam! Jet off across the galaxy and stop his experiments from causing havoc in otterspace!

name: Colossal Saga
description: Play with a variety of unique characters to conquer your friends or enemies in Versus, Survival, Dungeon and many other game modes, in this 1-4 players, couch coop action fighting game!

name: Carrier Trail
description: Deliver a package to the royal family and live to tell the tale! Carrier Trail is an indie, adventure game developed by CrackedGhostGames and inspired by the 1985 game, Oregon Trail.

name: Marble Race
description: Race through colorful levels filled with obstacles and monsters and claim the best time. Challenge your friends in a 4-way battle arena. Unlock secrets and even build your own levels. A tribute to "Hamsterball" and "Marble Madness".

name: DeepLands
description:
You have just bought a new house, and then your wife disappears. Strange things start to happen, and then!
you find your self in a dark and lonely place. Now you have to find a way home, and survive the DeepLands!

name: Solitaire 3D
description:
Enjoy over 100 different solitaire games (including all your favorites: Spider, Pyramid, FreeCell, Klondike, Tri-Peaks etc.), multiple card decks (including the unique 4 color card deck), online high scores, statistics, and much more.

Compete with players across the world with online high scores for each game!

With emphasis on ease-of-play and smooth beautiful graphics, Solitaire 3D is the perfect solitaire partner for all.

name: Return to Sector 9
description: Sequel to Ambush in Sector 9

name: Puzzle Dungeon
description: Puzzle Dungeon is a Sokoban game for iOS combining nostalgic gameplay and graphics with modern controls, UI and concepts such as online leader-boards. It was created by Robert Lane

name: Café Rouge
description: Café Rouge is an otome visual novel featuring 3+ pursue-able male love interests, 12 side characters, and 7+ hours of gameplay. Follow the story of Isis Black, your typical American teenager who gets a job interview from the mysterious Café Rouge.

name: Ceana the Wraithress
description: Sin descripción

name: Boris and the Dark Survival: Symphony of Shadows
description: The mad maestro returns

name: Pokémon: Let's Go Lugia
description: Pokémon: Let's Go Lugia is a rom hack of FireRed, based on the story of Soul Silver.

name: More or Less
description: More or less is a browser based guessing game with several sub topics.

name: Stella: My Friend
description: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: World Heritage Site
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.

-Venice and its Lagoon
-Mont Saint-Michel and its Bay
-Machu Picchu
-Angkor
-Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks
-Great Barrier Reef
-Vatican City -St. Peter's Basilica-
-Yosemite National Park
-Itsukushima Shrine
-Sacred Sites and Pilgrimage Routes in the Kii Mt. Range

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Wildlife in Africa
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.

-Lion
-Hippopotamus
-African bush elephant
-Cheetah
-Giraffe
-Zebra
-White rhinoceros
-Flamingo
-Leopard
-Meerkat

name: Mission NAR-6
description: Generate as much energy as possible by solving numerous puzzles that will require all your logic and skill, while dealing with unexpected ship breakdowns. An embedded AI on the verge of burn-out will accompany you with humor throughout the experience.

name: My Angel Girlfriend
description:
You’re just a typical high school student. You’ve got good friends. You’ve got good grades. Everything in your life is going well. But you can’t help but feel empty. Surely there’s got to be more to life than this? If you only had a sign! Well, your prayers are answered when you encounter a stunning girl mysteriously standing in the middle of the street. She tells you that she’s looking for an angel… You immediately realize that this girl is delusional and that this isn’t the kind of change you were looking for in your life. You head home. So much for that.

Suddenly, you hear someone tapping on your window. It’s that girl from before… But HOLY COW! She’s got beautiful angel wings and is flying outside your window! She’s actually a real angel! Now that she’s got your attention, she explains that she needs help finding her sister, a fallen angel. Not having a clue as to what on earth or heaven is going on, you agree to let her stay with you, only to wake up the next morning to find yet another gorgeous angel in your room. If there is a God, he must really like you!

Before you know it, the two angel girls have joined your school, and you’re helping them look for this ”fallen angel.” But, you soon learn that angels aren’t the only unearthly beings hiding in your school. Powerful devils looking to cause trouble are lurking about too! Can you help these two angel beauties save this fallen angel and foil the devils’ plot before all hell breaks loose? Don’t wait for a sign from heaven.

name: And Then He Went to the Tower
description: An entry for #bitsyjam June 2020 with the theme "Cursed Book".

name: Acolyte: Ascend
description: A bitsy interactive fiction game with a hint of dating sim about an acolyte and their deity reckoning with the end of the world.

name: Moirs
description: Moirs is a 7 Keys rhythm game, step into the world of music and enjoy the journey!

name: Fantasy Strike: Core Pack
description: The Core Pack gives you access to several game modes: Arcade mode, Versus mode for local play (including standard and team battle), Survival modes (including 4 sub-modes), and the over-the-top Boss Rush mode. The Core Pack also lets you send and receive direct challenges from friends online.

name: I Accidentally Restarted the USSR
description: Have you ever went on google and searched "I accidentally"? If you did then you saw that google autosuggest "I accidentally restarted the USSR". In this game you will be able to play the tail of Igor Ivanov as he accidentally restarts the USSR.

name: Mayor of Defense
description: You are the village chief. Just when you thought the promised slow life was waiting for you... A monster that attacks without end! Almost a one-man operation! Black Village! Work to get materials, money and hire mercenaries to defend your village.

name: 4ife
description: You have to overcome the challenging tasks you have to do in order to return from the parallel universe you are sent to to your own universe. But remember this: Returning home will not be as easy as you think. Find the portals and collect ancient coins.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Sakura - Japanese Cherry Blossoms
description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sakura - Japanese Cherry Blossoms -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Sea Slugs - Gems of the Sea
description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sea Slugs - Gems of the Sea -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Beautiful Sceneries in the USA
description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces : Beautiful Sceneries in the USA" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Zerowood
description: Zerowood is a 2D action game, where you play as a young man who has to save his parents from dangerous aliens. Use various weapons and fighting techniques to become the hero in this special action game.

name: Cruel Galaxy: Discordia
description: Cruel Galaxy: Discordia is a turn-based role-playing game, including tactical space combat, strategic elements and original story, filled by despair.

name: Droid Guier
description: Droid Guier, a challenging addicting robotic combat game, the player controls an Android and destroys several enemies, completes strategic missions, installs traps with explosive mines and lots of action with levels and enemies with various abilities.

name: Sharecare You
description: Sharecare You is an immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling anyone to explore its astonishing details in 360 degrees. Travel inside systems and organs, dissect them, visualize their natural and disease states, and even personalize the human body to be a virtual YOU!

name: The Door of Redemption
description: This is a text-based decryption game and interactive novel. When you wake up in a dungeon full of peculiar smell, someone tells you: you must find a way to escape from this dungeon, and be careful, you are not alone……

name: Ego in a Coma
description:
Ego In A Coma is 2D Action Sword Fighting Game.
Player can use several weapon to beat enemies.
This game has 5 stages and multi endings.

Each stage has different concept like Cyberpunk, Dark Fantasy, Digital World, and Psychedelic World.

name: Fallout 76: Season 1 - The Legendary Run
description: From the makers of Unstoppables Shindig, Blast Radius, and Catch the Commie comes The Legendary Run – an exciting new way to experience irradiated West Virginia. The Legendary Run is Fallout 76’s first Season and features a boardgame-inspired theme. As Captain Cosmos, you will race the evil Dr. Zorbo across the galaxy. Your progression through the Season will be represented as pieces on a game board. Can you beat Dr. Zorbo to the finish line? You have until mid-September to find out!

name: Pic-a-Pix Pieces 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolfenstein: Alt History Collection
description:
The Wolfenstein: Alt History Collection takes players on an epic adventure through a grim alternate history where Nazis have achieved global domination. Shoot, stab, and kill your way through the Nazi ranks in four critically acclaimed games in the Wolfenstein franchise:

Wolfenstein: The New Order
Wolfenstein: The Old Blood
Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus
Wolfenstein: Youngblood

name: Twelve Containers
description: TWELVE CONTAINERS - Containers auction simulator, take a risk betting on units, clean up containers get things and sell them!

name: The End of Decay
description: In a quiet library on the World, a history book spills its sordid secrets.

name: Townscaper
description: Townscaper is an experimental passion project. More of a toy than a game. Pick colors from the palette, plop down colored blocks of house on the irregular grid, and watch Townscaper's underlying algorithm automatically turn those blocks into cute little houses, arches, stairways, bridges and lush backyards, depending on their configuration.

name: Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense
description: Defenders: Survival and Tower Defense is a Cooperative First Person Shooter that redefines the tower defense genre. Team up with friends, drop in to a variety of diverse maps, and defend The Core from waves of hostiles with a unique arsenal of upgradable weapons and towers!

name: Extreme Escape
description: Extreme Escape is an escape-room puzzle game with an action component. It combines realistic graphics with challenges at high altitudes. The player must find his way out of a critical situation by facing difficult weather conditions, technical problems and the fear of heights.

name: Death Live
description:
Death live is a rail shooter game designed to be played on arcade. 
 
The objective is simple : Just - Kill - Everything. You'll have two weapons to do so : A main weapon that you can charge to be more powerful, and a mighty gravity orb that will incapacitate and damage most of your opponents.

name: Tri-Ger
description:
A color matching top-down arcade shooter inspired by arcade games like Galaga, Asteroids, and Ikaruga.

Defeat enemies in endless waves, and match colors in this retro synth wave bullet hell to get the highest score!

There are multiple bosses to defeat, and the waves are controlled with a dynamic difficulty curve that adjusts to your actions.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III - Extracurricular Edition
description:
Welcome to the new class VII - Explore the newly annexed lands of the Empire with a brand new squad, and catch up with familiar faces from the past.
an immersive story - Experience an epic story developed across three titles, and crafted for new and old fans alike. Also includes an interactive introduction to catch up new players to the ongoing story so anyone can dive right in to the world of trails of cold steel.

combat honed to a Fine edge - Challenge oncoming threats with a combat system that has been refined over the course of decades. The addition of features like brave order and the break system opens up new possibilities in battle

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing
description: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing is a species hunting fishing game from Dovetail Games about the passion and pursuit of what lurks beneath the waters. Take on the hunt of a lifetime as you target and pursue monster-sized fish around the world. With 35 species to hunt, you'll have to work up your strategy, skill and tactics to catch every boss fish in each venue. It'll take both patience and adrenaline to succeed as you choose your angling spot carefully, based on time of day, weather conditions and perfect equipment setup, before casting out into the water to battle and catch these elusive creatures.

name: Millions of Minions
description: Sorcery. Creepy Crawlies. Unknown Critters. Dungeon Delving. What more could you ask for? Oh.. Bosses? WE HAVE THOSE TOO!

name: CryptoFights
description: At its core, CryptoFights is a 1 vs. 1 turn based fighting game similar to a turn based street fighter, but with weapons and armor that you can change to outmatch your opponent. In CryptoFights, anyone can earn crypto tokens through gameplay, and is partly community-owned and influenced by the players. Power and glory can be yours to claim if you can prove you are worthy. Evolve your fighters, collect loot, and sell or melt items on our NFT marketplace.

name: Chrono Project
description: The Chrono project is a 2.5D side scroller game, set in a fantasy world, with the magical Chrono and the technological Robo. The game features a powerful time rewinding mechanic. Use it to explore different timelines and eventually save or damn the world.

name: Chotex Jam
description: Mapping jam event based on a custom texture set created by Chris Holden: nine small to medium-sized levels including a start map. It comes with a skybox and a few new models.

name: Super Smash Bros Ultimate: Marie Outfit and Wig
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Smash Bros Ultimate: Heihachi Outfit and Wig
description: Sin descripción

name: Fable Mosaics: Rapunzel
description: A hundred nonogram logic puzzles based on the fairy tale Rapunzel.

name: Jirai-kei Menhera Danshi to Icha Love Pien Ichigo Tabetaai
description:
When he woke up in the morning, Menhera was in the room.
Apparently Menhera was invading the room without permission!
The protagonist is being followed and bothered by him, but for some reason he can't let go of him...
The main character is swayed by Menhera today as well!?

A menhera BL visual novel.

name: Super Mario 2D World Deluxe
description: Relive the adventure of Super Mario 3D World now in 2D! Super Mario 2D World Deluxe is a fangame where players can spend hours of fun with friends. Players will be able to enjoy the new static and environmental objects, and the same characters from the Mario universe.

name: Smitty's Journey
description: A 2D puzzle platformer adventure, set in a bustling continent of Dripsdale, natively inhabited by droplet-like creatures called Dropples

name: Candypink
description: A perfectly normal cooking game.

name: Underground Keeper II
description: Underground Keeper II is a logical 3D puzzle game from a first person view. You will enjoy hours of entertainment in a 60 levels and 5 different environments. Levels generator included.

name: Sleeping Beauty
description: You're walking by the riverside and notice an unconscious girl. You do everything you can to wake her up but fail to do so. Then, you notice a stranger jewel on her neck and take it... only to get involved in an erotic quest to save the kingdom!

name: Frag Grounds
description: Immerse yourself in the classic military shooter experience or obliterate your foes with state-of-the-art, prototype equipment such as plasma rifles, remotely controlled mechs or with some good ol' tanks and attack helicopters in this dynamic FPS.

name: Deskmate Girl
description: Can you become a perfect boyfriend and let your girlfriend open her heart to you?

name: Viking Chronicles: Tale of the lost Queen
description: Join the adventure! Help the brave Vikings save their Queen and bring down the evil Ruans. In this great time management game!

name: Monolight
description: MONOLIGHT is 2D plat-former puzzle adventure game. Using tiny lantern, go through the maze.

name: Charge Kid
description: A challenging puzzle-platformer where each jump is a puzzle!

name: I Wanna Build a Robot
description: Action-packed pixel-art old-school dungeon crawler!

name: Gacha Club
description:
What club will you join? Get the party started and create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! Choose from thousands of dresses, shirts, hairstyles, weapons, and much more! After designing your characters, enter the Studio and create any scene you can imagine! Add pets, objects, and choose your favorite background! Customization is 100% free, there are no in-app purchases!

Ready for more action? Gacha over 180 units to use in battle! Choose from four different modes, including Story mode, Tower mode, and more! Collect gems, gold, and materials to enhance, awaken, and increase your skill levels! You can also play your favorite mini-games and collect gems and bytes to Gacha for more units! What are you waiting for? Step into Gacha Club and begin your adventure today!

name: Beneath a Withering Moon
description: The land is beset by shadow. You have two minutes to cast the spell that will banish the darkness. Can you restore light to the world? Or will you succumb to the dark?

name: Dashball
description:
Welcome to Dashball!
Gather your friends and get ready for some fun action in split screen multiplayer for up to 4 players.

You join the 'old batch' and will have to travel the world to show everyone that you and your squad are the ultimate dashball champions.

Game developed by 4 Gladiators studio, a small indie studio
which focuses on making couch multiplayer games and coop games.

name: Project Senko
description: After discovering his origins and enhanced abilities, Senko trains and masters them until perfection. Now he will need them to confront the horde of alien invaders looking to destroy his beloved city.

name: The Night Fisherman
description:
The English Protection Group keep a watchful eye on the Smuggler's Run, a renowned crossing for vessels bound from Calais containing illegal immigrants. 
 
When faced with an armed man, his voracious appetite for conversation, and nobody else for miles, can you safely get rid of him? 
 
This is a single, film-like scene. You direct the fisherman's actions, as well as directing the camera shots between the cinematic angles available. 
 
The first of twelve small, experimental narrative games to be released monthly.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Challenger Pack 6
description: Min Min from the ARMS game is coming to the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate game as a new playable fighter! This iconic fighter is the first fighter in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass Vol 2 DLC. Spring into action using the Ramram, Megawatt, and Dragon ARMS to keep your opponents at bay, distance is the key! Challenger Pack 6 also includes a new stage, Spring Stadium.

name: War Islands
description: Embark on a magical journey with 3 adventurers. Overcome fearsome beasts and challenging puzzles in an online third-person co-op game with your friends.

name: Hard to be a King
description: Hard to be a King is a cube-style strategy game. You will play a role in a fantasy world and become a lord, rule the land, and protect your people. Keep your people stay away from starving, build a stronghold to resist the dead army.

name: Solaris 2
description: Free online MMORPG game. Play with your friends. Conquer the continent and be the best. This is a private server for Metin2.

name: Manall's FF1
description: Sin descripción

name: Retribution Revisited
description: Small to medium-sized level (albeit with a high monster count). A singleplayer remake of Q3DM7- Temple of Retribution using custom textures. Comes with a music track. The map source is included.

name: Super Epic Random Bard Guy
description: Sin descripción

name: Lu:Cid
description:
Cid is cooped up in quarantine with little to do but feed the cat, mope around, read, and dream. When they sleep, their worries manifest as strange dream worlds with their own internal consistency. Explore to learn more about their anxieties surrounding the past, future, and present. Collect "dream effects" which change their appearance and grant various powers. Reunite with childhood cats and have them join your dream party.

All in all, I promise you, Cid is going to be OK. But what has happened to Lu?

name: Tetromino Chill
description:
Do you like placing blocks? How about placing blocks forever?

Based on Futilitris by Twinbeard Studios, Tetromino Chill is a game about chilling out and placing some blocks. Best when paired with some music or a movie.

name: Wart Worm Wingding
description: Wart Worm Wingding is a 2-player arcade adventure for the NES. The settlers' mining operations have gone too far. Help the Wart Worms, Wing and Ding, destroy the settler invaders and free their underground lands from exploitation!

name: 2 Seconds
description: Help the bull and cow escape the alien!

name: Series Makers Tycoon
description: In Series Makers you live your own directors' dream. You start in the 80s at the Netklix-University developing your first own series. Soon you will reach big success and earn tons of money. Be prepared to build your own series and streaming empire, in the world of Series Makers.

name: Baff F
description: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

name: Hopefully Good Reads
description: Hey, I'm headed to the library, want me to pick up anything?

name: Evolvedustry
description: E-Dustry: Sandbox Adventure Tower Defense Game

name: Dark Valiance
description:
Liara is a former royal knight, Who fell into darkness. Not strong enough to protect her people, she embraced dark arts and doomed herself. As she wanted, she's now able to kill her enemies. 
 
But does it really mean she's protecting the kingdom ? Wherever she goes, people are suffering, corrupted by her Dark Powers. The more she uses darkness to fight, The deadlier she is for her allies. 
 
 
 
The King Leoric assigned her to the protection of Logoria Castle. 
 
She has just arrived...

name: Higurashiki
description:
Play as Higurashiki, an insect-like girl who lives in a strange facility. There's one room she's not allowed to go into until she collects all the effects. When she finally enters, the truth will be revealed.

A Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.

name: Ranata the Frog and the Broken Forest
description: You have been summoned! help the Witch find the ingredients she needs in thiis arcade platformer.

name: Ice Scream
description:
"He's such a coward of a wolf."
They speak, behind his back, of the wolf boy Shirogane.
He's more cowardly and weak than anyone.
Even with the encouragement of his kind friend, his heart is forever full of sorrow.
Once more, his icy scream echoes across Iceberg Isle.

name: Molly and the Gunmids
description: A shoot 'em up / adventure full of drawings and sounds. There's one sound that's really annoying at one point, and that is the best sound in the game. Some of the drawings look as if they were drawn by a 1 year old baby. You can even explore a solar system and read a tiny book while fighting a sun demon.

name: Yellow Sails
description: A short and surreal dream exploration game created for the "Dream Diary Jam 4" event and submitted as a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Go to bed and dream of strange islands across distant oceans...

name: Hakoniwa Sumo
description: Sumo simulation game

name: Séculos
description: Séculos is a short game, inspired by the quarantine period, where you have to find ways to pass your time by doing various activities around the house you're stuck in, while you wait for someone to come. The activities include light puzzles and minigames, which may lead to different endings.

name: Paco and the Tumbling Seed Box
description: A physics-based single-player puzzle game that's family-friendly and highlights the endangered Puerto Rican Parrot.

name: Lairchitect
description: Build your own lair and protect your precious soul core from heroes that try to raid your dungeon. Distracting heroes and using the right minions to defeat them is key in winning this reverse dungeon crawler.

name: Shrine II
description: The Eldritch horde returns in Shrine II! Shrine II is a total conversion mod for Doom 2. Tusk is back, and his rage won't be quelled! Journey through five dimensions to find the source of the corruption in this 32 level total conversion for doom 2! Including: -Over 20 unique Demons to slay -Boss Battles Galore -Over 20 unique weapons -32 levels -Tons of secrets and replayability -A challenging yet fair difficulty

name: Ily
description: Two Mushrooms, lots of puzzles!

name: Queen B: Book 1
description: Queen B, Book 1 is the first book of the Queen B series. It is followed by Queen B, Book 2.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Trident of Power
description: The Trident of Power is a Zelda fangame developed by Pizus, under RPG Maker 2003. It offers a very complete experience with both battles and puzzles and a complete storyline taking place in both Hyrule and the neighboring country of Tylistem. The game is available in both Spanish and English

name: Qualia: The Path of Promise
description: “Machina” is the world's first android to pass the Turing Test. Incidentally, she is also dressed like a maid. Dr. Hiro Koshino ends up taking Machina home and has her work as a maid. As she continues to learn and grow, he also begins to develop certain feelings towards her…

name: Ungus
description: Ungus is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Pine, who wakes up in a strange forest, and explore the surrounding world. A submission for the 4th Yume Nikki Fangame jam.

name: Unduhagge
description: Unduhagge is a dream exploration game in the spirit of Yume Nikki. Join Mina Mori as she navigates a dreamscape full of absurdities, distressing personal memories and other experiences that push her beyond the veil and into the unknown.

name: Twin Unconscious
description: Twin Unconscious is an English fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 4.

name: Send You a Link
description:
A mysterious link; a weird program that you can't rid of.

Send You a Link is a small, nostalgia themed Yume Nikki fangame made for the Dream Diary Jam 4. The game is heavily inspired in the internet days of 2000-2010ish, including old memes, old teenage obsessions and aesthetics.

name: Moonlight
description: Moonlight is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as Rei and explore her dreams.

name: Memorial Playground
description: Memorial Playground is an English fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as August and explore his dreams. These dreams contains elements related to his past.

name: Kaizo Nikki
description:
Kaizo Nikki is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A poor fool by the name of "Hitmetsuki" is stuck in a strange place where he is tasked to go through several worlds and obtain "Pillars". It would appear that surviving those worlds might be harder than expected, however.

Kaizo Nikki is a more difficulty-based take on the Yume Nikki formula, featuring more enemies, more puzzles and more tricky terrain to navigate than usual.

name: Fractured Dreams
description:
"You can't ignore them forever."

Fractured Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You explore the dreams of James, and collect effects and tapes in his subconscious.

name: Dream Data
description:
Today you start your new job doing data entry for Data Portal Inc. It's not the most exciting job, but it pays the bills. Each night, you go home, go to sleep, and have vivid dreams that let you escape your mundane life. However, sometimes the line between dreams and real life start to get a bit blurred. Will you work hard and keep your job, or will you get out of touch with reality?

The game was heavily inspired by Yume Nikki, and it was created for Dream Diary Jam 4. So like Yume Nikki, the game is mostly just about walking around and exploring dreams. However, there are a few significant changes in how this plays compared to Yume Nikki and most fan games.

name: Chiller
description:
A brief, strangely familiar tale of a man who got into trouble at his job and now spends his time all alone, dreaming of better days.

A contribution to DDJ4.

name: An Annventure to End Them All
description: The final game in the Annventure trilogy of Earthbound inspired horror RPGs

name: Moonday
description:
One night a UFO crashes somewhere in rural fields. Ushitsuki, local farmer (and a cow girl) finds the alien who now needs to repair his space ship using colors hidden in Ushitsuki's dreams.

Moonday is heavily inspired by Yume Nikki and shares some mechanics with it - exploration of dream worlds via going to bed, finding/equipping special "effects" which change character's appearance/abilities, etc.

name: Cerasus
description: Our good man, Reshnha, has been trapped in a world of dreams via an unknown force, and now he must escape by finding all the songs, strewn across a land composed of a pastiche of his own thoughts, memories and actions.

name: Nana
description:
Nana is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You explore nana's dreams, the goal being to explore and collect effects.
Is nana hiding something? Someone?

name: Cats in Hell
description: Cats in Hell is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as a cat and explore Hell. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain new skills. Equipping skills doesn't erase the effect of the previous one. This means that all effects can be equipped at the same time.

name: Abashment
description: Abashment is a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as Jonathan and explore his dreams.

name: Iron Order 1919
description: An unique long-term strategy game with week-long matches with up to 101 players, set in the alternate reality of 1919.

name: Colmen's Quest
description:
Colmen's Quest is a turn-based fantasy RPG. You play as Colmen, an aspiring monster hunter, who is on a quest to unveil a dark threat that haunts the village of Valkirk. You will explore Valkirk and its villagers, descend dusky dungeons, fight monsters and eventually collect a bunch of loot and treasures.

The game is inspired by classic Hack & Slays like Diablo and turn-based RPGs like Rogue's Tale or Stoneshard, however it's not a roguelike game.

name: Hidden Expedition: The Price of Paradise - Collector's Edition
description: Your first expedition was going great until someone awakened an Aztec goddess of nature with one thing on her mind – Revenge!

name: Born to Kill
description: Seek and kill the dictator of the fictional country of Bahn, in this isometric-shooter game.

name: The Zone
description: Dimitri has a mission: go to an island and disable all the electrical installations to avoid that strange creatures have multiplies and go out.

name: Beaver Fun River Run: Steam Edition
description: Beaver Fun River Run is an arcade-style, single-player, pixel art inspired, canoe racing game.

name: 问道仙途
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Girl Breeder
description: Our protagonist is settling in for a gaming session with the latest erotic fantasy game, when they are suddenly whisked away to a fantasy world! Waking up in front of a horde of horny monster girls, its up to you to repopulate their isolated village!

name: Midnight Renegade
description: Defeat the chief of a corrupt task force, and bring peace back to London in this 2d action platformer.

name: Dim Glow
description: Dim Glow is a casual game where you control a dark sphere and you need to shoot at enemies, for each hit you get a point. You also have a limited number of bullets, and 4 lives that are taken away if you are hit. And how many times will you be able to hit enemies?

name: Arc Defence
description: Arc defence is a game in genre classic top down 2d tower defense, But in difference of classic TD, enemies can fight back. Use towers upgrades and special abilities to stop waves. Be ready for epic battle and try to protect our lands!

name: West of Dead: Path of the Crow Edition
description: The Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition contains, the Crow familiar, a new level (The Battlefield), new enemy (The Captain), a new weapon (The Mortar).

name: Hard Driver
description: Incredibly beautiful and dynamic Side-Scroller, where you control a car that flew into the air with a super-cool driver must Dodge obstacles, flying past clouds, shooting off flying debris and collecting various Goodies on the way home!

name: Go, Go Cowboy
description: Fast and hurricane Top-Down-Shooter where you act as a Sheriff in the Wild West and must quickly deal with all the bandits in the area, arm yourself with your trusty revolver and go on a dangerous journey!

name: Ginkgo
description: Ginkgo is a single player 3D horror game set in a dreamlike space inspired by East Asian horror. Armed with a magic needle that can sew parts of the world together, solve puzzles and outsmart monsters as you explore a surreal world.

name: Sudoky
description:
Sudoku - is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 subgrids that compose the grid (also called "boxes", "blocks", or "regions") contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.

- Complete 300 puzzles, Easy/Medium/Hard
- Random level generator, play as many as you want
- Multiple light & dark color themes
- Relaxing music

name: Cybershow
description: Cybershow is a fast-paced first-person sci-fi action shooter. Battle your way out of the city against the local military and police!

name: Shape Shooter
description: Shape Shooter provides you an action-packed, satisfying, colorful, and hectic roguelike experience. Survive increasingly difficult random generated stages and collect relics, weapons, and active items to help you on your way.

name: Dungeons 3: Complete Collection
description: Dungeons 3 - Complete Collection is the ultimate edition of the latest installment in the popular Dungeons series of strategy games. Build and manage your own dungeon as an evil Dungeon Lord, recruit new monsters and place cunning traps for unsuspecting adventurers. At the same time, dare to conquer the vast overworld in a comprehensive story campaign. Enjoy a sheer endless amount of content across single player, multiplayer and skirmish modes with this collection spanning the base game including several free content updates and seven expansion packs!

name: Zoku Sono Higurashi vs Touhou Universe 2
description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The shocking work that appeared in 2016 finally appears on Steam! * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

name: City Driving Simulator
description: A new and exciting car driving game that lets you try out a plethora of different vehicles in a beautiful city! Drive a car, a bus, fill up your tank at a gas station and more!

name: Seven Doors
description: Solves riddles and secret languages, overcome dangerous situations and becomes part of a giant chess game. Atmosphere, mystery and enigmas await you to surprise you and test your skills... Seven atmospheres, seven challenges, seven solutions. Will you reach the seventh door?

name: Low Poly Racing
description: Low Poly Racing is a game that has been in development since the start of 2020 and it still has many aspects of it unfinished. The game itself is an arcade racer and it implements AI and different tracks in the mix to make the game fun to play and competitive. Things in the game, custom AI, different tracks(new one just got released), 3 different cars(more coming soon), TimeTrial Mode and Racing Mode against Bots. Local Multiplayer is still on the works and possible coming within the next month. It will also be coming to mobile some time in the future. You can download and test the game for free and don't forget to let me know what you thought of it, it helps a lot with further progress in development. The game should be played with a controller for better experience.

name: Little Town Hero: Big Idea Edition
description:
Izzit? Dazzit!: use your ideas to outwit and defend against enemies, then strike back with strong attacks.
charming LOCALS: befriend townspeople to gain their support, as well as unlock more ideas to use in battle.
there's no place like home: enjoy life in this little town with a whimsical soundtrack by Toby Fox (under tale) and cozy art style by game Freak

name: A Week in the Cold
description: Traverse the cold slippery ice by sliding and skating while trying to avoid both pesky penguins and ghostly wolves. All the while moving between campfires trying to stay warm.

name: A Day Without Me
description:
A Day Without Me is an intriguing adventure game with a high emphasis on puzzles. It combines adventure, horror and drama elements. Main character wakes up as the only person left in the whole city. Now he has to find out what’s happened, where has everyone gone and how to overcome a series of strange events happening in front of his own eyes.

This narrative exploration title features semi-open world, stylish isometric graphics and unrestful story of the sole person left in the city. Being just a teenager, this boy has to do a man’s job — solve plenty of puzzles and challenges to uncover the mystery of everyone’s disappearance. Are you ready for «A Day Without Me»?

name: The Last Sky
description:
The Last Sky is a narrative puzzle adventure about life, loss, and love. Through its meditative, dreamlike atmosphere you are invited to embark on a journey into Jake's mind, contemplating the opposites of life & death, fear & love, and loss & hope.

A visual odyssey about the beauty and sorrow of life, explore Jake's past, present, and future, as you progress through the mysterious multi-branching storyline. Enter a surreal dream world, where to overcome the past, Jake must reconnect with the present and the choices that you make will lead to one of several uniquely crafted endings.

The Last Sky combines 3D puzzles with 2D platforming inside a beautifully visualized world where the boundaries between dreams and reality dissolve as you become Jake's rudder in an uncharted ocean.

name: The Rig
description: THE RIG is an immersive, story-driven SPACE-NOIR ADVENTURE developed exclusively for VR. Explore a fully-interactive light freighter as you attempt to land, find your brother, and uncover a tightly-woven mystery of murder and broken romance.

name: Horizon Vanguard
description:
Blast your hovercycle through the enemy's crushing forces under a bright blue sky!

Use your hovercycle to dodge enemy fire and attack armored ground targets while taking aim with your pistol to destabilize and destroy aerial foes! Use your radar to get your bearings when overwhelmed!

name: Emulate Thrill
description: Emulate Thrill is a mobile BL game.

name: Tuiterland 3
description: Everything you need to know about Tuiterland 3, the biggest playable parody on social media!

name: Konk World
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Ninji Land
description:
It's a somewhat short and easy hack starring everyone's favorite little ninjas from SMB2!
The Ninji woke up to find their island full of unwanted enemies! Where are they from? Why are they here?

name: Engage Souls
description:
Engage Souls is an RPG based on the theme of the new "e Guessing Game".
The story tells of a team comprising five young boys and girls who aim to be professional Engage proponents known as contractors. You Pick from one of six academies and nurture these aspiring contractors and follow their individual stories

name: After L!fe: The Sacred Kaleidoscope
description: A mobile gacha simulation game with RPG and otome elements. Manage 20 Soul Reapers, learn their backstories, and help them purify vengeful spirits.

name: Burden 2: Remnants
description:
"In dreaming I can see them again."

This game began as a submission to the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 4 and a sequel to Burden RPG. As a Yume Nikki fangame this game is based off of exploration and discovery directed by the player.

After the events of the horror game Burden, Mila returns to the surface world and tries to live a normal life. But, in her dreams she gets to see her loved ones again.

name: Sky Combat
description:
Sky Combat — air force game with epic PvP dogfight.
Fly modern jet planes, destroy dangerous enemies and get the adrenaline rush you crave!! Immerse yourself in this war plane game and become the flying ace!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Song Pack Vol. 1
description: It's a special song pack including 6 popular arrangements of Touhou songs, plus 6 challenges to go with each song!! This pack includes new artists, get in the ring and Tumeneco!

name: Pokémon Quarantine Crystal
description: A mod of Pokémon Crystal featuring a completely new Pokédex designed by drearyterminarch. There are new trainers to face, an amped-up level curve, features from newer games like the Fairy-type and physical-special split, and a number of QoL features to make the Johto region feel fresh and interesting to explore.

name: Tsubasa+
description:
TSUBASA+ is a real-world game that combines Captain Tsubasa, around the world, and FIFPro soccer players to allow you to build your own team, and battle other players.

Players walk around the real world and battle with Captain Tsubasa characters and real soccer players at stadiums scattered around the game! Recruit a variety of players onto your team. Create your very own team from your recruits while you play in 1-on-1 battles with 3 players around the world to make the best team possible!

This title no longer appears on mobile stores as of Q3 2021.

name: Rain and Red Roses
description:
The Year Is 1968. Trying to sleep amid academic pressure, pretending to be alright, and a raging thunderstorm outside of your dorm room, all you have to do is get in bed and get some rest. If only your dreams would cooperate...

Rain And Red Roses is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. It primarily uses Alice in Wonderland as its theme mixed with 1960's aesthetic. The goal is to explore and collect effects, with the option to collect four counts of red paint as well, which unlocks a different ending.

name: Raid
description: Three Stones has changed while I was away. A celebration timed to a long-awaited homecoming was made into a weird, disturbing crime scene. Wary looks watching your every step, no trust, no smile... but I'll find the truth.

name: Furry Nya
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Aim Master H
description: Aim Master H is the first 2D Aim Game on Steam, designed to warmup and boost your aim quickly and easily.

name: The Running Man
description: If you want to relax, this game is not for you, this game is made to make you rage. go through challenging and hard levels and run to the finish line. will you take the challenge?

name: Coronavirus: Nano Force
description: A fast-paced arcade shooter where you pilot a nano-ship in the fight against the Coronavirus. Grab powerups to upgrade your weapons and eliminate the virus infection.

name: Vergjorn
description: Vergjorn is a citybuilding strategy game. Vergjorn takes place in the Viking era, where you build your city, grow your population and go raiding for treasure. You have to build ships, train vikings and forge weapons to be able to conquer foreign lands.

name: Rescue Team: Danger from Outer Space!
description: Stop an alien threat from wreaking untold devastation on Earth! After a meteor strikes Florida and releases strange spores, weird plants begin to grow and destroy entire cities! Only the Rescue Team has the skills to deal with this menace from outer space!

name: Break Space: Out of Bounds
description: Break Space: Out of Bounds is a game that will bring 80's nostalgia to today's modernity! Control a spaceship and prevent the Terran nation from being enslaved by the Marthians.

name: 妙语连珠
description: Unique creative game with new playing methods. Extremely burning brain, please make sure that you have completed the nine-year compulsory education!

name: Yuri Ogibalov's Bizarre Adventure
description: Yuri Ogibalov's Bizarre Adventure is top-down action rpg, focused on exploration, characters and fights. Explore the dangerous and not so friendly environment of the russian province. Fight enemies in turn based battle system with tons different weapons and items.

name: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War - Brazil
description: This DLC adds a new playable nation: Brazil. Content includes 4 new Brazilian agents, 2 Brazilian scientists, a Brazilian diplomat, Exfiltration in the city of Brasilia, Brazil, and a Brazil trait: your first agent gets Ghost trait.

name: Escape Game Fort Boyard
description: Beat all the trials to escape the Fort with the treasure!

name: Last Fantasy Hentai
description: Last Fantasy Hentai continues to tell the story of a guy who is transported to a fantasy world where he meets women ready to fulfill their most pleasurable desires.

name: Dungeon of Trials
description: Looking for a good, balanced and challenging dungeon crawler? Your quest is over! Dungeon of Trials is the adventure you were looking for! Take the role of the Adventurer's Guild Master and lead a group of four heroes to glory! Face the dangers of the 5 levels of the Labyrinth of Fulerus!

name: Jack and Jane Jungle Escape
description: Jack and Jane Jungle Escape is a platform game in which we will have to flee from the police through a dangerous jungle. An endless corridor with a colorful visual style where the game will end when we collide and the law enforcement officer catches us.

name: Shikari Rising
description: Join Novak as he fights his way through hordes of fearsome monsters and unravel the mystery of monster resurgence in his land . Inspired by Metroidvania-style and hack 'n slash action rpg, Shikari Rising will plunge you into action and will test your mettle against extremely tough enemies.

name: Boomer Simulator
description: Boomer Simulator is a lawn mowing racing game where you fight against the clock to unlock ever more challenging levels. Simple touch controls let you control your lawn mower as you navigate between trees and stones to mow grass and rid your backyard of those pesky zoomers.

name: Space Court
description: As a newly appointed Judge, you will rule over Space Court and its denizens to keep the universe safe. Or possibly blow it all up. Either way, you’re tenured.

name: Urban Flow
description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

name: G-Mode Archives 06: Shijou Saikyou Miyamoto Julia
description: 50 years after the end of the Galactic War, the eastern galaxy's bubble economy finally pops. The resulting depression catapults society into a desperate age of class stratification, with workers at the bottom struggling to make ends meet. Julia Miyamoto, the player character, is a temp worker doing her best to get by in the bad economy. She takes a gig at the Galaxy Crisis Management Organization, where she discovers that she has an incredible talent for cleaning up other people's messes, and sets out to prove herself. In the process, she'll find herself drawn into a galaxy-wide conspiracy. This mission-based action RPG has players setting out to clear missions by wiping out waves of enemies as efficiently as possible.

name: Marie Antoinette's Solitaire
description: In this historical Solitaire game you have been invited to take a peek into the life of queen Marie Antoinette. Earn beautiful trophies and help Marie pick the accessories for her signature hairdo – all by playing the classic game of solitaire.

name: Death Match Love Comedy!
description:
Death Match Love Comedy, does the exact opposite of usual visual novel, as having a girl fall in love with you could mean your death.

Basically, the premise of the game is that the player is a guy that just got transferred to a new school, and if a girl confesses her love to him, he explodes… and dies. To make matters worse, he falls into some sort of love triangle with two beautiful girls, leaving his fate up in the air.

Unlike other dating simulations, where your goal is to get girls to fall in love with you, in Death Match Love Comedy, you’ll be doing everything you can to avoid just that, as you try to figure out the reason behind the love-fueled explosions.

Additionally, there will be another mysterious phenomenon, such as angels, a friend who has some sort of prediction, weird dreams and whispers, and a strange pink cat-like creature.

name: Anno 1602: History Edition
description:
Relive the beginnings of the Anno series with 1602 A.D. and its expansion New Islands, New Adventure in Anno 1602 History Edition. See the game like never before, updated and optimized to work smoothly on current computers with resolutions of up to 4K, and enjoy all of the upgrades while continuing your existing game, thanks to full save compatibility.

Immediately unlock more than 40 new scenarios and 200 new islands in the New Islands, New Adventure expansion.
Enjoy updated and expanded multiplayer functionality.
Take advantage of improvements like borderless window mode and mouse-wheel zoom.
Includes bonus content: Anno 1602 soundtrack, wallpaper, and a company logo for Anno 1800.

name: Anno 1503: History Edition
description:
Dive into the classic gameplay and long-lost multiplayer mode of 1503 A.D.: The New World and its expansion Treasures, Monsters & Pirates in Anno 1503 History Edition, updated and optimized to work smoothly on current computers with resolutions of up to 4K.

Unlock new scenarios, sandbox games, buildings, and animals with the exciting Treasures, Monsters & Pirates expansion.
Discover the long-lost multiplayer mode, released officially for the first time!
Enjoy all of the upgrades while continuing your existing game, thanks to full save compatibility.
Take advantage of improvements like borderless window mode and improved scrolling.
Includes bonus content: Anno 1503 soundtrack, wallpaper, and company logo for Anno 1800.

name: Anno History Collection
description: Relive the captivating city-building gameplay of Anno 1602, Anno 1503, Anno 1701, Anno 1404, and their expansions. Enjoy a variety of improvements in each game while continuing your existing games, thanks to full save compatibility, and experience all of the updates with resolutions up to 4K.

name: Pokémon: Legends of the Arena
description:
Legends of the Arena is a fan-made Pokémon game, made using RPG Maker XP.

It is about a young hero who signs up to the International Pokémon Championships with his brother. He faces many obstacles, including a sinister cult intending to manipulate the competition for their own ends, and a set of fellow contestants who will stop at nothing to win.

name: Anno 1701: History Edition
description: Rediscover the classic gameplay of the first 3D Anno game, 1701 A.D. and its expansion The Sunken Dragon in Anno 1701 History Edition. See the game like never before, updated and optimized to work smoothly on current computers with resolutions of up to 4K, and enjoy all improvements while continuing your existing game, thanks to full save compatibility.

name: Anno 1404: History Edition
description: Relive the captivating gameplay of a true city-building classic with Dawn of Discovery and its Venice expansion in Anno 1404 History Edition. See the game like never before, updated and optimized to work smoothly on current computers with resolutions of up to 4K, and enjoy all improvements while continuing your existing game with full save compatibility.

name: Being Stronger While Playing! SilverStar Go DX
description:
Enjoy learning and becoming stronger even though you’ve never played Go!
●Let’s learn in Go class!
2,855 problems in total! The definitive software for learning Go including the rules and terms of Go!!

Explanation and exercise. Learn the basics and advance in two ways!
Beneficial for Go novices as well as for beginner and intermediate players looking to increase their skills!

name: Arcade Archives: Wiz
description: Wiz is an action game released by Seibu Kaihatsu in 1985. Play as Wiz, a wizard who controls 8 types of Magic to fight from the Depths, to the Land Realm, and finally into the Sky Realm. Defeat the monsters standing in your way, and make it to the Sky Realm to face off with a dragon.

name: Solar Gladiators
description: Solar Gladiators is a top down arena shooting game that mimic the technical limitations of the MSX1 computers. Use your bouncing disc as a weapon and roll to avoid enemy attacks. Face 15 different opponents, learn about their unique attack patterns and rise as the champion of this ancient competition.

name: Penguin's Dogma
description:
A simple horror-style stealth game, where you can have fun playing tag with penguins.
If you get caught three times, you lose.
If you burn all of the penguins to a crisp, you win.

name: Check Inventory
description: Prepare to defeat Xandrion!

name: Idle Heroes: Odyssey
description: This is still an semi-idle game suitable for fishing at work, covers leisure and strategy. It inherits many of the game features loved by the previous players, and adds new gameplay and elements in battle, skills, levels, and town management. As a hero leader, you need to recruit your hero, collect treasures and equipment, and run towns to upgrade the combat team. Facing powerful monsters on the expedition, you also need strategies to match heroes, skills and treasures, finally save the heroes world again.

name: Borderlands 3: Bounty of Blood - A Fistful of Redemption
description:
If you're eager to travel to Gehenna and hunt the Devil Riders but not far enough into the Borderlands 3 story to use Sanctuary III, level-boost straight to campaign add-on content when creating a new Vault Hunter so you can head there right away.

Enemies and loot on the all-new frontier planet will scale to your Vault Hunter's level, so you'll be suitably challenged and rewarded as you explore the dusty wastes and cut canyons in search of your quarry.

name: Nyanco Card
description: Nyanco Card ~ 東方夢猫 幻想遊戯 is a fan-made game based on the Touhou Project worldview. Enjoy reliving Nyanco's memories while also making new ones with her and the Touhou characters in the Gensokyo world!

name: The Sentinel
description: The Sentinel is a story game featuring horror and voltage. Your goal is to survive in the North Sentinel Island where you inadvertently fell. But you are not alone in the island. While fleeing from the Sentinels that make up the Sentinel Tribe, you must also follow the path that fate has shown you and then escape the island.
